title: Sampler, early 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery, cotton foundation
Technique: cross stitch on plain weave
provenance: ex. coll. Mrs. Henry E. Coe (Eva Johnston Coe)
creditline: Bequest of Mrs. Henry E. Coe
description: Detached motifs including the Holy monogram, a bird on a branch, a woman standing at a gate, a carriage with horse and drivers and the initials "A.M."

tombstone.epitaph:
Sampler, early 19th century.
early 19th century. Medium: silk embroidery, cotton foundation
Technique: cross stitch on plain weave. Bequest of Mrs. Henry E. Coe. 1941-69-208.
